channel.title: What is wrong with my client and/or server? [508]
channel.description:
finally i got a almost working client that let's me to see the loading screen but now it won't load anything more at: "Connecting to Update server"
What to do to get the client and server work??(this is berkyscape 508)

item.title: What is wrong with my client and/or server? [508]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

… You need to run the server before opening the client, and check that the client is trying to connect to 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic
item.source: What is wrong with my client and/or server? [508]
